main.description: Create a follow request to a private profile. If the profile is not private, this will fail and the client should create a regular follow instead. Duplicate requests to the same subject will be rejected. Requires auth.

subject.description: DID of the private profile to request to follow

uri.description: AT-URI of the created follow request record

cid.description: CID of the created follow request record

errors.name: ProfileNotPrivate
errors.description: The target profile is not private; use regular follow instead

errors.name: DuplicateRequest
errors.description: A pending follow request to this subject already exists

errors.name: SubjectNotFound
errors.description: The specified subject DID could not be found
